attributes.action: Please re-open the British embassy in Tehran-Iran.
attributes.additional_details: On 29th of November 2011, the British government decided to close the British embassy in Tehran due to a mob action of a little number of Iranian citizens. It has been about five years that Iranian people struggle to get visa or visit UK embassy.
attributes.background: We, as Iranian-British citizens think it is about the time to act on behalf of all the lawful citizens of Iran, who happen to be our family members to ask the British government to consider our rights.

rejection.details:
It appears that the UK Embassy in Iran was reopened last year: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/foreign-secretary-to-reopen-british-embassy-in-tehran

If there are specific services which are not available from this embassy, you could start a petition asking for those to be made available.
